#summary Command line tools documentation.

= Command line tools =

== Prerequisites ==

Install

 * JDK version 1.7 or later, http://openjdk.java.net/
 * Genotype list command line tools, http://code.google.com/p/genotype-list/downloads/list

<br/>
Add the gl-tools bin directory to your path

{{{
$ export GL_TOOLS_HOME=...installation directory
$ export PATH=$PATH:$GL_TOOLS_HOME/bin
}}}

<br />
== Usage ==
<wiki:comment>Generated by ./wiki-usage-generator.sh</wiki:comment>
=== Register loci ===
{{{
$ gl-register-loci --help
usage:
gl-register-loci --namespace http://localhost:8080/gl/ [-g glstrings.txt] [-i identifiers.txt] [-t bearer-token] [-c json]

arguments:
   -h, --help  display help message [optional]

   -s, --namespace [class java.lang.String]  namespace [required]

   -g, --glstrings [class java.io.File]  glstring input file [optional]

   -i, --identifiers [class java.io.File]  identifier output file [optional]

   -t, --bearer-token [class java.lang.String]  OAuth 2.0 bearer token [optional]

   -c, --client [class java.lang.String]  client implementation, json or xml, default json [optional]

}}}

<br/>
